name: Slam of Germs
description:
Slam of Germs is a fast-paced puzzle game in which you need to infect all of the houses in an endless stream levels. The catch is that you have limited control over your movement and you're racing against the clock. How many levels can you manage?

How to play

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Use the layout of the levels to guide you to where you want to go. Also, keep track of the time bar at the bottom of the screen.

Development

The main challenges during the development were generating solvable levels, and determining how they could be solved from each position in the level. The latter of the two is needed to control the difficulty curve. I solved these issues by being smart through blood, sweet and tears.

The music in the game was made by Marching Dream.

Total development time: 18 hours
